trans-unit.source: Used to control how <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping"></xref> data packets are transmitted.
trans-unit.target: Brukes til å kontrollere hvordan <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping"> </xref> verdien SANN overføres.

trans-unit.source: The PingOptions class provides the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> properties to control how Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request packets are transmitted.
trans-unit.target: Klassen PingOptions gir den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>Egenskaper for å styre hvordan Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) Oppdater forespørselpakker overføres.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A> property specifies the Time to Live for packets sent by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>Egenskapen angir tiden til Live for pakker som er sendt av <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>klasse.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value indicates the number of routing nodes that can forward a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> packet before it is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien angir antall noder som ruting som kan videresende en <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>pakke før den forkastes.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>

trans-unit.source: Setting this option is useful if you want to test the number of forwards, also known as hops, are required to send a packet from a source computer to a destination computer.
trans-unit.target: Angi dette alternativet er nyttig hvis du ønsker å teste antall videresending, også kalt Hopp, kreves for å sende en pakke fra en kildedatamaskinen til måldatamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> property controls whether data sent to a remote host can be divided into multiple packets.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>egenskapskontroller om data sendes til en ekstern vert kan deles inn i flere pakker.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>

trans-unit.source: This option is useful if you want to test the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the routers and gateways used to transmit the packet.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er nyttig hvis du ønsker å teste maksimalt overføringsenhet (MTU) av rutere og gatewayer som brukes til å sende pakken.

trans-unit.source: Instances of the PingOptions class are passed to the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply> class returns instances of PingOptions via the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Forekomster av klassen PingOptions er sendt til den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>metoder, og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply>klassen returnerer forekomster av PingOptions via den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of PingOptions, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av PingOptions, kan du se den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>|128| |<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>|`false`| You can set the properties to new values before calling <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> or <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>|&128; | | <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>| `false`| Du kan angi egenskapene til nye verdier før du kaller <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions"></xref> class and sets the Time to Live and fragmentation values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions"> </xref> klasse og angir tiden til Live og fragmentert verdier.

trans-unit.source: The `ttl` parameter limits the number of routers and gateways that can forward the data.
trans-unit.target: Den `ttl` parameteren begrenser antall rutere og gatewayer som kan videresende dataene.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for testing the length of the route between the local and remote computers.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for å teste lengden på rute mellom de lokale og eksterne datamaskinene.

trans-unit.source: The `dontFragment` parameter allows you to test the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the routers and gateways used to transmit the packet.
trans-unit.target: Den `dontFragment` parameteren kan du teste maksimalt overføringsenhet (MTU) av rutere og gatewayer som brukes til å sende pakken.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value greater than zero that specifies the number of times that the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping"></xref> data packets can be forwarded.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi større enn null som angir hvor mange ganger som den <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping"> </xref> verdien SANN kan videresendes.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to prevent data sent to the remote host from being fragmented; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>slik at data sendes til den eksterne verten fra blir fragmentert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ttl is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: ttl er mindre enn eller lik null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that controls fragmentation of the data sent to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som bestemmer fragmentert av dataene som sendes til den eksterne verten.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Applications use this property to control whether data sent to a remote host by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class can be divided into multiple packets.
trans-unit.target: Programmer bruker denne egenskapen til å kontrollere om data sendes til en ekstern vert av den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>klassen kan deles inn i flere pakker.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>

trans-unit.source: This option is useful if you want to test the maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the routers and gateways used to transmit the packet.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er nyttig hvis du ønsker å teste maksimalt overføringsenhet (MTU) av rutere og gatewayer som brukes til å sende pakken.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the data sent to the remote host is larger then the MTU of a gateway or router between the sender and the remote host, the ping operation fails with status <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `true` og dataene som sendes til den eksterne verten er større og deretter MTU på gateway eller ruter mellom avsenderen og den eksterne verten ping-operasjonen mislyktes med statusen <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data cannot be sent in multiple packets; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dataene ikke kan sendes i flere pakker; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of routing nodes that can forward the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping"></xref> data before it is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall noder som ruting som kan videresende den <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping"> </xref> data før den slettes.

trans-unit.source: As gateways and routers transmit packets through a network, they decrement the current Time-to-Live (TTL) value found in the packet header.
trans-unit.target: Som gatewayer og rutere sende pakker via et nettverk, reduserer de gjeldende--levetid (TTL) verdien finnes i overskriften pakke.

trans-unit.source: If the TTL value reaches zero, the packet is deemed undeliverable and is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien TTL når null, pakken anses som ikke leveres og forkastes.

trans-unit.source: This option is useful if you want to test the number of routers and gateways used to transmit the data.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet er nyttig hvis du ønsker å teste antallet rutere og gatewayer som brukes til å sende dataene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the number of times the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping"></xref> data packets can be forwarded.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som angir hvor mange ganger i <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping"> </xref> verdien SANN kan videresendes.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default is 128.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 128.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien for en set-operasjon er mindre enn eller lik null.
